# Introduction


# Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ERRTG/RASCHplot")
install.packages(c("eRm","iarm"))
```


# Quick Start

First, we load the `RASCHplot` package

```{r setup}
library(RASCHplot)
```

We load a data set from the `iarm` package.

```{r}
library(iarm)
data(amts)
```

```{r}
AMTS.complete <- amts[complete.cases(amts), ]
it.AMTS <- AMTS.complete[, 4:13]
```

We fit the model using the most basic call to glmnet.

```{r}
model.AMTS <- RM(it.AMTS, sum0 = FALSE)
item_restscore(model.AMTS)
```
